meanings.definition: Phytonutrients: Nutrients found in plants that are beneficial to human health.
meanings.sent1: Eating a variety of fruits and vegetables ensures you get enough phytonutrients for good health.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend including phytonutrients in your diet to boost your immune system.
meanings.sent3: The phytonutrients in spinach are like tiny superheroes protecting your body from harm.
meanings.sent4: Her glowing skin was a result of the phytonutrients she consumed daily.
meanings.sent5: Imagine phytonutrients as a colorful army fighting off illnesses in your body.

meanings.definition: Phytonutrients: Compounds in plants that have antioxidant properties.
meanings.sent1: Blueberries are known for their high levels of phytonutrients that fight off harmful free radicals.
meanings.sent2: Including phytonutrients like lycopene in your diet can help prevent cell damage.
meanings.sent3: The antioxidants in phytonutrients are like shields protecting your cells from harm.
meanings.sent4: Herbal teas are a great source of phytonutrients that keep your body healthy.
meanings.sent5: Picture phytonutrients as tiny warriors battling the effects of aging on your body.
